org.greatage.ioc.resource
Class AbstractMessages

java.lang.Object
  org.greatage.ioc.resource.AbstractMessages
All Implemented Interfaces:
Messages
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessagesImpl
public abstract class AbstractMessages
extends java.lang.Object
implements Messages

This class represents abstract implementation of Messages returns placeholder if doesn't contain localized string key and uses String.format(java.util.Locale, String, Object...) for formatting.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

AbstractMessages

protected AbstractMessages(java.util.Locale locale)
